thread.title: Nielsen joins North American Title Co. as Senior Vice President, Division Manager for California’s Alameda and Contra Costa Counties
thread.title_full: Nielsen joins North American Title Co. as Senior Vice President, Division Manager for California’s Alameda and Contra Costa Counties

author: Dia Demmon
title: Nielsen joins North American Title Co. as Senior Vice President, Division Manager for California’s Alameda and Contra Costa Counties
text:
Kelli Nielsen has rejoined North American Title Co. (NAT) as its new senior vice president, division manager for Alameda and Contra Costa Counties. She has more than 25 years of experience managing operations and driving sales growth in the title insurance and lending industries. “We are excited that Kelli has joined our leadership team, lending her diverse talents to our operations in strategic San Francisco Bay Area markets,” said Dia Demmon, NAT president for California and Nevada. “Kelli brings extraordinary value to our organization with her depth of industry experience, charismatic leadership style, and proven track record of building successful sales and operations teams. We are confident she will invigorate our team and promote market share growth and profitability for the company.”
Nielsen is returning as a respected former NAT sales manager and county manager. She holds a Bachelor of Arts in management from Saint Mary’s College of California. Her affiliations include the Women’s Council of Realtors, National Notary Association, Contra Costa Association of Realtors and Habitat for Humanity.
“I am delighted to be back and looking forward to leading and inspiring the team,” said Nielsen.
Nielsen is located at the NAT Western Region headquarters at 1855 Gateway Blvd., Suite 600, Concord, CA 94520, telephone number (925) 935-5599.
About North American Title
With well over 1,000 associates and a vast network of branches from coast to coast, North American Title (NAT) is among the largest real estate settlement service providers in the United States. Consisting of both agent and underwriter operations, NAT reported annual net revenues in fiscal 2014 of $189 million. The company also has the resources and stability of a wholly owned subsidiary of an S&P 500 company with over $12.9 billion in assets (fiscal quarter ending Nov. 30, 2014). North American Title’s agency network operates nationally under the name North American Title Co. (NATC), and is located in 18 of the fastest-growing states: Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Florida, Illinois, Indiana, Maryland, Minnesota, Nevada, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Texas, Utah, Virginia and Washington, D.C. Through our relationship with our expanding affiliate network, NATC provides real estate settlement services in all 50 states. NAT is headquartered in Miami, Fla. To learn more, visit http://www.nat.com
